name: Windows 95 Infinite
description:
Ever just wondered if you could use Windows IN YOUR BROWSER?

Ever just wondered if you could use Windows RG, but more STABLE?

Introducing Windows 95 Infinite!

It's revolutionary, funny, and fabulous!

It's the HTML version of Windows 95!

Including Clippy! He's cute, fast, and entertaining!

Windows 95 Infinite+ and Windows 98 Infinite are sold in the same place. It's just a skin.

Windows 2000 and ME Infinite are coming soon.
